name: Sex and the Furry Titty 2: Sins of the City
name_original: Sex and the Furry Titty 2: Sins of the City
description:
Sex and the Furry Titty 2 offers you even sexier stories, more ladies, and more ways to get dirty with them! FIve all-new branching stories will be available on launch with more free content coming after the release! You'll get to meet new characters and check back with the ones you know! And there will even be a few cameos this time!



Explore new, improved stories with more exciting and diverse branching narratives. We're experimenting with POV stories, adding threesomes and generally turning it up a few notches!
The plot won’t take away from the artwork and sex scenes, either. With new artists joining the ranks, expect a visual feast with even hotter still images and improved animations. The puzzle sections are getting upgrades as well with new level objectives, improved balance and better overall feel.


The warm evening air outside is just wonderful, it smells like spring... and par-tay! Your friend Marcelle invites you out to their frat soiree and you are determined to find some good company for the evening. And maybe for the whole night, hmm?


Wow! Elliott you crafty S.O.B! Finally you got brave enough to ask your gorgeous woman out! Ah, what an evening it’s going to be! Candles, piano music, a fancy restaurant. Nothing is able to tear this dream date apart, not a pretty waiter nor the sudden arrival of a long-time-no-see girlfriend. Isn’t it, right?..


“Certainly not, mister! I am here but to clean your chambers!”, she says.
“Is that all you have come here for? What about… cleaning figurines?”, he replies.
What an insufferable nerd! Anyway, he is so handsome and cute… Definitely worth a try! Cleaning services are so boring, after all.
She only needs to make her intentions obvious somehow.


Best friends are always concerned for the well-being of their bros! Especially when it’s so devastating to look at both their mutual crush and inability to talk to each other.
Well, there are other ways to kindle a flame of love! Nothing beats a good old poker game. With special spicy punishments at stake, of course.


She is the fierce angel of the ring, the goddess of war, the unapproachable valkyrie, and he is… well. He is Ricky, just Ricky. He is a fine guy, of course - but is he even good enough for a majestic being like her?
Anyway, it won’t hurt to try to make a move? Will it??




Don’t forget to add the game to your wishlist and click the follow button so you won’t miss out on exciting news and exclusive previews!

Features


  • Five sexy stories featuring both your favourite returning characters and some brand new ones!
  • Branching narrative, choices, and decisions in style of a Visual Novel
  • Hand-animated sex scenes
  • Classic Match-3 gameplay
